SEARCH
Package Client.UI.TUI

Class CardBuilder

java.lang.Object
Client.UI.TUI.CardBuilder
public class CardBuilder extends Object
Class responsible for building each card, the building method is sensible to whether the card has a covered corner or not The class has a different method for each row of the card The cards are 6 rows high and 15 characters wide

  • Method Details

    • buildLine

      public String buildLine(int row, PlayableCard card)
      based on the "row" parameter, it calls a different building method which will return a line containing the specified "row" for the specified "card"
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the card that has to be built
      card - the corresponding PlayableCard
      Returns:
      a line containing the desired row of characters
